title: Ticket #3404: condor_advertise fails with multiple collectors
description:
When there are multiple collectors, all but the first one will not receive ads from condor_advertise, unless using a publication command that requires an ACK.

The cause of this bug is that the variable 'command' is overwritten after publishing to the first collector.
